applicationDetails: Builders Deputy Lead [JOY-0037] - REDUCED APPLICATION STAKE!
title: Builders Deputy Lead
shortDescription: [Joystream Video DAO](https://joystream.org) is actively looking for a Builders Deputy Lead
description:
[Joystream Video DAO](https://joystream.org) is actively looking for a Builders Working Group Deputy Lead to join our team. This role is mainly managerial one. Applicants are expected to have proven track of experience in Agile, managing remote and distributed teams. 

Who are we:

- Joystream is an open-source blockchain project that will be truly user-governed. 

 - [Builders](https://joystream.notion.site/Who-we-are-d34c0f54ac804b429db4c260ddac29ba) are a small groups of engineers helping to make Jsgenesis products better

Who are you:

- Currently employed (have a day job) 

- Have at least 1 year commercial experience as the project manager 

- Experience in Agile methodologies: Scrum, SAFe 

- Team Facilitation 

-  

- Weekly Reporting 

- Github Projects 

- Time tracking 

- Self-starter, fast learner

- Have excellent communication skills 

[üìù Apply Today!](https://dao.joystream.org/#/working-groups/openings/operationsWorkingGroupAlpha-37)

applicationFormQuestions.question: Tell us a bit about yourself
Do you have experience with Github Projects?
Are you comfortable to be interviewed in English in voice?
Your availability, in hours per day
Do you understand the compensation model?
Recommend us an awesome video channel
